item.title: Double-Double® Burger Combo #1
item.name: Combo #1
item.content: Double-Double® Burger French Fries Medium Drink

item.title: Hamburger
item.name: Hamburger
item.content: Your standard burger, with sponge-dough bun, 2-ounce patty, lettuce, tomatoes, with or without onions, pickles, and spread.

item.title: Cheeseburger
item.name: Cheeseburger
item.content: Everything you'd get on the hamburger, but with a slice of American cheese thrown in for good measure.

item.title: Double-Double®
item.name: Double-Double
item.content: Now throw on another patty and slice of cheese, either with or without onions.

item.title: Fresh French Fries
item.name: Fries
item.content: Order them well-done if you like your fries crispier and browner. Order them “light” if you prefer them closer to raw.

item.title: Milkshakes
item.name: Shakes
item.content: That’s right milkshake fans, you can have In N Out’s shakes in large and xlarge sizes! It’s not written directly on the menu, but yes, it is available!

item.title: Soft Drink
item.name: Soft Drink
item.content: Refreshing selections include Coca-Cola Classic, Diet Coke, 7Up, Dr. Pepper, root bear, lemonade, Minute Maid Light Lemonade, iced tea, and coffee.
